content: repeat for finishing this row weave in ends wet block and lay flat to dry pinning out the points along the bobble edge row 4 purl repeat row 1-4 twice more three reps total fae wing shawl pg 5 charts are read from right to left and then left to right they show the rs and the ws chart a chart b example of possible increases = repeat = no stitch = knit on the rs purl on the ws = ssk = k2tog = yo = dd slip_stitch knitwise k2tog psso = cdd slip 2 sts knitwise k1 p2sso = kfb fae wing shawl pg 6 156 cm / 62 33 / mc 48 cast on abbreviations pg 7 approx = approximately pm = place marker beg = beginning prev = previous bobble = bind off psso = passover bor = beginning of round pu = pick up cc = contrasting colour pwise = purlwise chain = chain rem = remaining circ s = circular needle s repeat = repeat cn = cable needle rev st st = reverse stockinette stitch co = cast on round s = round s cont = continue rs = right side double_crochet = double_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet dpn s = double pointed needle s skip = skip decrease s = decrease s skp = slip one stitch knit one stich pass slipped stitch foll = follow ing over knitted stitch decrease half_double_crochet = half-double_crochet sl = slip hk = hook sl1k = slip one stitch knitwise increase = increase sl1p = slip one stitch purlwise incl = including sl m = slip marker k = knit space s = space s k2tog = knit two stitches together decrease ssk = slip slip knit two slipped stitches together kfb = knit into front and back of stitch increase decrease ktbl = knit through back loop sssk = slip slip slip knit all slipped stitches together kwise = knitwise double decrease lp s = loop s st s = stitche s m = marker st st = stockinette stitch / stocking stitch m1 = make one increase tbl = through back loops m1l = left slanting increase decrease = together m1r = right slanting increase ws = wrong side mc = main colour wyib = with yarn in back p = purl wyif = with yarn in front p2tog = purl two stitches together decrease yo = yarn over patt = pattern hope you enjoyed the pattern thanks from bohoknits
